verses.verse: But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G367>Ananias,<s%> with his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4551>Sapphira,<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> a <S%G2933>piece<s%> of <S%G2933>property,<s%>

and <S%G3557>kept<s%> <S%G3557>back<s%> [some] of the <S%G5092>price<s%> for himself, with his wife's <S%G4924>full<s%> <S%G4924>knowledge,<s%> and <S%G5342>bringing<s%> a <S%G3313>portion<s%> of it, he <S%G5087>laid<s%> it at the apostles' <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G367>"Ananias,<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> has <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G4137>filled<s%> your <S%G2588>heart<s%> to <S%G5574>lie<s%> to the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and to <S%G3557>keep<s%> <S%G3557>back<s%> [some] of the <S%G5092>price<s%> of the <S%G5564>land<s%>?

"While it <S%G3306>remained<s%> [unsold,] did it not <S%G3306>remain<s%> your own? And after it was <S%G4097>sold,<s%> was it not <S%G1722>under<s%> your <S%G1849>control<s%>? <S%G5101>Why<s%> is it that you have <S%G5087>conceived<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4229>deed<s%> in your <S%G2588>heart<s%>? You have not <S%G5574>lied<s%> to <S%G444>men,<s%> but to <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And as he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G1634>breathed<s%> his <S%G1634>last;<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> upon <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G191>heard<s%> of it.
And the <S%G3501>young<s%> <S%G3501>men<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G4958>covered<s%> him up, and after <S%G1627>carrying<s%> him out, they <S%G2290>buried<s%> him.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G1096>elapsed<s%> an <S%G1292>interval<s%> of <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G5610>hours,<s%> and his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in, not <S%G3609>knowing<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>responded<s%> to her, <S%G3004>"Tell<s%> me <S%G1487>whether<s%> you <S%G591>sold<s%> the <S%G5564>land<s%> for <S%G5118>such<s%> and <S%G5118>such<s%> a <S%G5118>price<s%>?" And she <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> that was the <S%G5118>price.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> [said] to her, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> is it that you have <S%G4856>agreed<s%> <S%G4856>together<s%> to <S%G3985>put<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to the <S%G3985>test<s%>? <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G2290>buried<s%> your <S%G435>husband<s%> are at the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and they shall <S%G1627>carry<s%> you out [as well]."

And she <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> at his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G1634>breathed<s%> her <S%G1634>last;<s%> and the <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in and <S%G2147>found<s%> her <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and they <S%G1627>carried<s%> her out and <S%G2290>buried<s%> her <S%G4314>beside<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>
And <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> upon the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> and upon <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

And at the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> were <S%G1096>taking<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people;<s%> and they were <S%G3956>all<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> in Solomon's <S%G4745>portico.<s%>

But <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> to <S%G2853>associate<s%> with them; <S%G235>however,<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3170>held<s%> them in <S%G3170>high<s%> <S%G3170>esteem.<s%>

And <S%G3123>all<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G4100>believers<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4128>multitudes<s%> of <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G1135>women,<s%> were constantly <S%G4369>added<s%> to [their number];

to <S%G5620>such<s%> an <S%G5620>extent<s%> that they <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1627>carried<s%> the <S%G772>sick<s%> out into the <S%G4116>streets,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> them on <S%G2825>cots<s%> and <S%G2895>pallets,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that when <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by, at <S%G2579>least<s%> his <S%G4639>shadow<s%> might <S%G1982>fall<s%> on <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of them.

And <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4128>people<s%> from the <S%G4172>cities<s%> in the <S%G4038>vicinity<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> were <S%G4905>coming<s%> <S%G4905>together,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> people who were <S%G772>sick<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G3791>afflicted<s%> with <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%> and they were <S%G537>all<s%> being <S%G2323>healed.<s%>

But the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> up, <S%G2532>along<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4862>associates<s%> (that is the <S%G139>sect<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>), and they were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G2205>jealousy;<s%>
and they <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and <S%G5087>put<s%> them in a <S%G1219>public<s%> <S%G5084>jail.<s%>

But an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>during<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G2374>gates<s%> of the <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G1806>taking<s%> them out he <S%G3004>said,<s%>

<S%G4198>"Go<s%> your <S%G4198>way,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> and <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G2992>people<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4487>message<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2222>Life.<s%>"

And upon <S%G191>hearing<s%> [this,] they <S%G1525>entered<s%> into the <S%G2413>temple<s%> <S%G5259>about<s%> <S%G3722>daybreak,<s%> and [began] to <S%G1321>teach.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> and his <S%G4862>associates<s%> had <S%G1525>come,<s%> they <S%G4779>called<s%> the <S%G4892>Council<s%> <S%G4779>together,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1087>Senate<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> [orders] to the <S%G1201>prison<s%> <S%G1201>house<s%> for them to be <S%G71>brought.<s%>
But the <S%G5257>officers<s%> who <S%G3854>came<s%> did not <S%G2147>find<s%> them in the <S%G5438>prison;<s%> and they <S%G390>returned,<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> back,

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1201>prison<s%> <S%G1201>house<s%> <S%G2808>locked<s%> <S%G3956>quite<s%> <S%G803>securely<s%> and the <S%G5441>guards<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> at the <S%G2374>doors;<s%> but when we had <S%G455>opened<s%> up, we <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2080>inside.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G4755>captain<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple<s%> [guard] and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> they were <S%G1280>greatly<s%> <S%G1280>perplexed<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> them as to <S%G5101>what<s%> would <S%G1096>come<s%> of <S%G3778>this.<s%>

But <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> to them, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5087>put<s%> in <S%G5438>prison<s%> are <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G2992>people!<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G4755>captain<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>along<s%> with the <S%G5257>officers<s%> and [proceeded] to <S%G71>bring<s%> them [back] <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G3326><s%> <S%G970>violence<s%> (for they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> they should be <S%G3034>stoned<s%>).
And when they had <S%G71>brought<s%> them, they <S%G2476>stood<s%> them <S%G1722>before<s%> the <S%G4892>Council.<s%> And the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1905>questioned<s%> them,

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G3853>gave<s%> you <S%G3852>strict<s%> <S%G3852>orders<s%> not to continue <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> you have <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> with your <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> and <S%G1014>intend<s%> to <S%G1863>bring<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man's <S%G129>blood<s%> upon us."

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3980>obey<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

"The <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you had <S%G1315>put<s%> to <S%G1315>death<s%> by <S%G2910>hanging<s%> Him on a <S%G3586>cross.<s%>

"He is the one whom <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> to His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> as a <S%G747>Prince<s%> and a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> to <S%G1325>grant<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G2274>Israel,<s%> and <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

"And we are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4487>things;<s%> and [so is] the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3980>obey<s%> Him."
But when they <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they were <S%G1282>cut<s%> to the <S%G1282>quick<s%> and were <S%G1014>intending<s%> to <S%G337>slay<s%> them.

But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1059>Gamaliel,<s%> a <S%G3547>teacher<s%> of the <S%G3547>Law,<s%> <S%G5093>respected<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up in the <S%G4892>Council<s%> and <S%G2753>gave<s%> <S%G2753>orders<s%> to <S%G4160>put<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> for a <S%G1024>short<s%> <S%G1024>time.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G4337>take<s%> <S%G4337>care<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you <S%G3195>propose<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> with <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>some<s%> <S%G2250>time<s%> <S%G4253>ago<s%> <S%G2333>Theudas<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> up, <S%G3004>claiming<s%> to be <S%G5100>somebody;<s%> and a <S%G706>group<s%> of <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G4346>joined<s%> up with him. And he was <S%G337>slain;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G3982>followed<s%> him were <S%G1262>dispersed<s%> and <S%G1096>came<s%> to <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G3326>"After<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> of <S%G1057>Galilee<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> up in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G582>census,<s%> and <S%G868>drew<s%> <S%G868>away<s%> [some] <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> him, he <S%G2548>too<s%> <S%G622>perished,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> those <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G3982>followed<s%> him were <S%G1287>scattered.<s%>

"And <S%G2532>so<s%> in the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G3568>case,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G868>stay<s%> <S%G868>away<s%> from <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> and <S%G863>let<s%> them <S%G863>alone,<s%> for <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1012>plan<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2041>action<s%> should be of <S%G444>men,<s%> it will be <S%G2647>overthrown;<s%>

but <S%G1487>if<s%> it is of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you will not be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2647>overthrow<s%> them; <S%G3379>or<s%> <S%G3379>else<s%> you may <S%G2532>even<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2314>fighting<s%> <S%G2314>against<s%> <S%G2314>God.<s%> "

And they <S%G3982>took<s%> his <S%G3982>advice;<s%> and after <S%G4341>calling<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> in, they <S%G1194>flogged<s%> them and <S%G3853>ordered<s%> them to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> more in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and [then] <S%G630>released<s%> them.

<S%G3767>So<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> on their <S%G4198>way<s%> from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G4892>Council,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> that they had been <S%G2661>considered<s%> <S%G2661>worthy<s%> to <S%G718>suffer<s%> <S%G818>shame<s%> for [His] <S%G3686>name.<s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and from <S%G3624>house<s%> to <S%G3624>house,<s%> they <S%G3756>kept<s%> <S%G3973><s%> <S%G3756>right<s%> <S%G3973><s%> on <S%G1321>teaching<s%> and <S%G2097>preaching<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> [as] the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
